characterDescription:
Ton is one of the customers at an inn where Took showed off his slave, Szeth.
There, Szeth was directed by Took to pour Ton's beer on his own head, to which Ton objected because he wasn't done with it yet.
Ton griped that Took should get Szeth to do something else.
When Szeth reveals that he is Truthless and, as such, can't take his own life, Ton declares that Szeth speaks with smooth words, soft and proper like a lighteyes.
